conclusion: The slopes of the velocity-time graphs for both objects at \\( t_1 \\) are compared.
The absolute values of the slopes are equal, indicating equal magnitudes of acceleration.
The directions of the accelerations are opposite due to the nature of the quarter-circle arcs.
The accelerations are not the same because they have different directions.
The conclusion that the two objects do not have the same acceleration at time \\( t_1 \\) is supported by the graph.
